mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trips ( event_id, user_id, start_city, end_city, distance, cost, current_people, trip_date, trip_time, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{eventId}, #{userId}, #{startCity}, #{endCity}, #{distance}, #{cost}, #{currentPeople}, #{tripDate}, #{tripTime}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE trips SET distance = #{distance}, cost = #{cost}, current_people = #{currentPeople}, status = #{status} WHERE trip_id = #{tripId}

SELECT ta.apply_id AS applyId, ta.user_id AS userId, e.title AS title, t.start_city AS startCity, t.end_city AS endCity, e.start_date AS date, t.current_people AS applyCount, ta.status AS status FROM trip_applications ta JOIN trips t ON ta.event_id = t.event_id JOIN event e ON t.event_id = e.id ORDER BY ta.apply_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip_applications (user_id, event_id, apply_date, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{eventId}, NOW(), #{status})

SELECT t.start_city AS startCity, t.end_city AS endCity, MAX(e.title) AS title, MAX(t.trip_date) AS tripDate, SUM(t.current_people) AS totalPeople, MAX(t.status) AS status FROM trips t JOIN event e ON t.event_id = e.id GROUP BY t.start_city, t.end_city ORDER BY t.start_city, t.end_city;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM trip_applications WHERE event_id = #{eventId} AND user_id = #{userId}
